Enable_User_Profile_Labels.enable_confirmation_success_body_one_lab: A confirmation email will be sent to
Enable_User_Profile_Labels.enable_confirmation_success_body_two_lab: to confirm that their record has been enabled

Disable_Review_Body_Labels.disable_confirmation_body_label: You are about to disable this review body
Disable_Review_Body_Labels.disable_confirmation_success_body_one_la: A confirmation email will be sent to
Disable_Review_Body_Labels.disable_confirmation_success_body_two_la: to confirm that their profile has been disabled.

Enable_Review_Body_Labels.enable_confirmation_header_label: Confirm that you want to enable
Enable_Review_Body_Labels.enable_confirmation_body_label: You are about to enable this review body
Enable_Review_Body_Labels.enable_confirmation_success_body_one_lab: A confirmation email will be sent to
Enable_Review_Body_Labels.enable_confirmation_success_body_two_lab: to confirm that their profile has been enabled.

Disable_Sponsor_Organisation_Labels.disable_confirmation_body_label: You are about to disable this sponsor organisation.

Enable_Sponsor_Organisation_Labels.enable_confirmation_header_label: Confirm that you want to enable
Enable_Sponsor_Organisation_Labels.enable_confirmation_body_label: You are about to enable this sponsor organisation.

Disable_User_In_Sponsor_Organisation_Lab.disable_confirmation_body_label: You are about to disable the user from working under this sponsor organisation.

Remove_User_From_Review_Body_Labels.remove_user_confirmation_success_body_tw: has been sent an email confirming that they have been removed from

Add_User_Review_Body_Labels.page_guidance_text: has been sent an email confirming that they have been added to

Delete_Modification_Confirmation_Labels.delete_modification_page_heading: Confirm that you want to permanently delete modification
Delete_Modification_Confirmation_Labels.page_guidance_text: Deleting a modification cannot be undone.

Delete_Document_Confirmation_Labels.delete_multiple_documents_page_heading: Are you sure you want to delete these documents?
Delete_Document_Confirmation_Labels.delete_single_document_page_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

Project_Record_Created_Labels.confirmation_body: Your project is now available to manage.

Modification_Sent_To_Sponsor_Labels.page_guidance_text: You've sent your modification to the sponsor. They'll either accept the changes and submit it, or contact you for more information.

Project_Record_Delete_Labels.page_heading_prefix: Are you sure you want to delete project
Project_Record_Delete_Labels.confirmation_body: Deleting a project cannot be undone.

Modification_Authorised_Submitted_Review.page_heading: The modification has been authorised and submitted for review
Modification_Authorised_Submitted_Review.confirmation_body: The modification has been authorised, submitted and is awaiting approval.

Modification_Authorised_Approved.confirmation_body: The modification has been authorised, submitted and approved. No further review or approval is needed.

Modification_Not_Authorised.confirmation_body: The modification has been recorded as not authorised. If the modification is still required the researcher will need to create a new modification.

Modification_Outcome_Sent.page_heading: Review outcome successfully sent to applicant
Modification_Outcome_Sent.confirmation_body: The applicant will receive a status update. Any next steps has been sent to the applicant.

Close_Project_Sent_To_Sponsor.confirmation_body: The project closure is now with the sponsor. They'll either authorise and submit it or mark it as not authorised. They may contact you if they need more information.
